column1: Originally the [[Hobbits]]' preferred style of dwelling
column3: downs and banks. By the late [[Third Age]]
column4: these had largely been replaced by buildings of wood or brick
column5: but hobbit-holes were still in use by the more established Hobbit families of [[the Shire]]
column8: or by the poorest who "went on living in burrows of the most primitive kind
column10: with only one window or none".<ref>{{FR|Hobbits}}</ref>
